property_sql_factory_datasets.sql:
WITH "CTE_RTWM" AS (
    SELECT 
        "GoodsReceipt"."ID"       AS "GoodsReceipt_ID",
        "PDItem"."ID"             AS "PurchaseDocumentLine_ID",
        "VendInvLine"."ID"        AS "VendorInvoiceLine_ID"
    FROM "o_custom_GoodsReceipt" AS "GoodsReceipt"
        INNER JOIN "o_custom_VendorInvoiceLine" AS "VendInvLine"
            ON "GoodsReceipt"."ID" = "VendInvLine"."GoodsReceipt_ID"
        INNER JOIN "o_custom_PurchaseDocumentLine" AS "PDItem"
            ON "VendInvLine"."PurchaseDocumentLine_ID" = "PDItem"."ID"
    UNION
    SELECT 
        "GoodsReceipt"."ID"       AS "GoodsReceipt_ID",
        "PDItem"."ID"             AS "PurchaseDocumentLine_ID",
        "VendInvLine"."ID"        AS "VendorInvoiceLine_ID"
    FROM "o_custom_GoodsReceipt" AS "GoodsReceipt"
        INNER JOIN "o_custom_PurchaseDocumentLine" AS "PDItem"
            ON "GoodsReceipt"."PurchaseDocumentLine_ID" = "PDItem"."ID"
        INNER JOIN "o_custom_VendorInvoiceLine" AS "VendInvLine"
            ON "PDItem"."ID" = "VendInvLine"."PurchaseDocumentLine_ID"
),
    "CTE_RTWM_1" AS (
    SELECT 
        "GoodsReceipt"."ID"     AS "GoodsReceipt_ID",
        NULL                    AS "PurchaseDocumentLine_ID",
        "VendInvLine"."ID"      AS "VendorInvoiceLine_ID"
    FROM "o_custom_GoodsReceipt" AS "GoodsReceipt"
        INNER JOIN "o_custom_VendorInvoiceLine" AS "VendInvLine"
            ON "GoodsReceipt"."ID" = "VendInvLine"."GoodsReceipt_ID"
    EXCEPT
    SELECT 
        "CTE_RTWM"."GoodsReceipt_ID"           AS "GoodsReceipt_ID",
        NULL                                   AS "PurchaseDocumentLine_ID",
        "CTE_RTWM"."VendorInvoiceLine_ID"      AS "VendorInvoiceLine_ID"
    FROM "CTE_RTWM" AS "CTE_RTWM"
),
    "CTE_RTWM_2" AS (
    SELECT 
        NULL               AS "GoodsReceipt_ID",
        "PDItem"."ID"      AS "PurchaseDocumentLine_ID",
        "VendInvLine"."ID" AS "VendorInvoiceLine_ID"
    FROM "o_custom_VendorInvoiceLine" AS "VendInvLine"
        INNER JOIN "o_custom_PurchaseDocumentLine" AS "PDItem"
            ON "VendInvLine"."PurchaseDocumentLine_ID" = "PDItem"."ID"
    EXCEPT
    SELECT 
        NULL                                  AS "GoodsReceipt_ID",
        "CTE_RTWM"."PurchaseDocumentLine_ID"  AS "PurchaseDocumentLine_ID",
        "CTE_RTWM"."VendorInvoiceLine_ID"     AS "VendorInvoiceLine_ID"
    FROM "CTE_RTWM" AS "CTE_RTWM"
),
    "CTE_RTWM_3" AS (
    SELECT 
        "GoodsReceipt"."ID"     AS "GoodsReceipt_ID",
        "PDItem"."ID"           AS "PurchaseDocumentLine_ID",
        NULL                    AS "VendorInvoiceLine_ID"
    FROM "o_custom_GoodsReceipt" AS "GoodsReceipt"
        INNER JOIN "o_custom_PurchaseDocumentLine" AS "PDItem"
            ON "GoodsReceipt"."PurchaseDocumentLine_ID" = "PDItem"."ID"
    EXCEPT
    SELECT 
        "CTE_RTWM"."GoodsReceipt_ID"          AS "GoodsReceipt_ID",
        "CTE_RTWM"."PurchaseDocumentLine_ID"  AS "PurchaseDocumentLine_ID",
        NULL                                  AS "VendorInvoiceLine_ID"
    FROM "CTE_RTWM" AS "CTE_RTWM"
),
    "CTE_UNION" AS (
    SELECT   
        "CTE_RTWM"."GoodsReceipt_ID"            AS "GoodsReceipt_ID",
        "CTE_RTWM"."PurchaseDocumentLine_ID"    AS "PurchaseDocumentLine_ID",
        "CTE_RTWM"."VendorInvoiceLine_ID"      AS "VendorInvoiceLine_ID"
    FROM "CTE_RTWM" AS "CTE_RTWM"
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 
        "CTE_RTWM_1"."GoodsReceipt_ID"                 AS "GoodsReceipt_ID",
        "CTE_RTWM_1"."PurchaseDocumentLine_ID"         AS "PurchaseDocumentLine_ID",
        "CTE_RTWM_1"."VendorInvoiceLine_ID"           AS "VendorInvoiceLine_ID"
    FROM "CTE_RTWM_1" AS "CTE_RTWM_1"
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 
        "CTE_RTWM_2"."GoodsReceipt_ID"             AS "GoodsReceipt_ID",
        "CTE_RTWM_2"."PurchaseDocumentLine_ID"     AS "PurchaseDocumentLine_ID",
        "CTE_RTWM_2"."VendorInvoiceLine_ID"       AS "VendorInvoiceLine_ID"
    FROM "CTE_RTWM_2" AS "CTE_RTWM_2"
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 
        "CTE_RTWM_3"."GoodsReceipt_ID"           AS "GoodsReceipt_ID",
        "CTE_RTWM_3"."PurchaseDocumentLine_ID"   AS "PurchaseDocumentLine_ID",
        "CTE_RTWM_3"."VendorInvoiceLine_ID"     AS "VendorInvoiceLine_ID"
    FROM "CTE_RTWM_3" AS "CTE_RTWM_3"
)
SELECT 
    CASE WHEN "UNION"."GoodsReceipt_ID" IS NOT NULL THEN  "UNION"."GoodsReceipt_ID" ELSE '' END
        || CASE WHEN "UNION"."PurchaseDocumentLine_ID" IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT('::', "UNION"."PurchaseDocumentLine_ID") ELSE '' END
        || CASE WHEN "UNION"."VendorInvoiceLine_ID" IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT('::', "UNION"."VendorInvoiceLine_ID") ELSE '' END        AS "ID",
    "UNION"."GoodsReceipt_ID"                                                                                                        AS "GoodsReceipt",
    "UNION"."PurchaseDocumentLine_ID"                                                                                                AS "PurchaseDocumentLine",
    "UNION"."VendorInvoiceLine_ID"                                                                                                   AS "VendorInvoiceLine"
FROM "CTE_UNION" AS "UNION"
